descriptionHtml:
[size=5]This mod include  my character as follower.
Helen is in the main hall of Jorrvaskr.[b]
She is a powerful Mage Destruction, with various spells and shouts, she is
Essencial and you can marry her. Health 999, Stamina 999 and Magicka 999.

[/b]Versions in  7Base and CBBE


[b]Manual Install - or install with some manager
==============
1. Extract the files to a temporary location such as the desktop.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to (install folder)\Skyrim.


Manual Uninstall
===============
1. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

Credits :
